gpii_app_qss_settings_close.tooltip:
Close Morphic QuickStrip

You can reopen it using the Morphic Icon (below)

gpii_app_qss_settings_undo.tooltip: Undo the last change you made in the Morphic QuickStrip.
gpii_app_qss_settings_undo.title: Undo

gpii_app_qss_settings_resetAll.tooltip:
Resets to the standard settings for this computer

(and signs you out of Morphic but does not change your saved settings)
gpii_app_qss_settings_resetAll.title: Reset to Standard

gpii_app_qss_settings_save.tooltip: Save your preferences so you can use them on other computers that have Morphic installed.
gpii_app_qss_settings_save.title: Save

gpii_app_qss_settings_mySavedSettings.title: My Saved Settings
gpii_app_qss_settings_mySavedSettings.footerTip:
• To apply your saved settings, insert a Morphic USB key.
  • To re-apply them, remove and then reinsert the Morphic Key.

gpii_app_qss_settings_more.tooltip: More options for changing the settings on this computer.
gpii_app_qss_settings_more.title:
MORE...

(& HELP)

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-selfVoicing.tooltip: Turn “Select to Read Aloud” extension in Chrome browser on/off.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-selfVoicing.title: Chrome Read Aloud
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-selfVoicing.tip: Turns on and adjusts Read Aloud mode in Chrome
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-selfVoicing.extendedTip:
To use Read Aloud

  1. Open web page in Chrome
  2. Select / highlight text
  3. Click Play button that pops up

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-highContras.tooltip:
Change the contrast between the text and background color, so text is easier to read.

Contrast changes will affect Windows, Edge, Chrome, and some other applications.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-highContras.title: High / Low Contrast
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-highContras.tip:
Changes contrast & colors

Works in Chrome, Edge, and apps that support Windows contrast themes. (May need to restart some apps.)

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-DPIScale.tooltip:
Change whole screen to make everything larger/smaller.

Works for everything.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-DPIScale.title: Screen Zoom
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-DPIScale.tip:
Zooms everything on the screen

Amount of Zoom up and down differs by computer.

gpii_app_qss_settings_appTextZoom.tooltip:
Changes text size.

Works with many applications including Edge, Chrome, Firefox, Microsoft Office, and more.
gpii_app_qss_settings_appTextZoom.title: Zoom Top Window
gpii_app_qss_settings_appTextZoom.tip:
Zoom Top Window

Note: Not all windows zoom.
gpii_app_qss_settings_appTextZoom.footerTip: Want a faster way to zoom a window?

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-language.tooltip:
Change Language of Menus & Ribbons.

Works in Windows, Edge, Office and other programs with language packs installed.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-language.title: Language of Menus
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-language.tip:
Change Language of Menus/Ribbons

Works in Windows, and other apps that support Windows language settings.

  • Does not translate documents etc.
  • You may need to restart some apps to see change.

gpii_app_qss_settings_usb-open.tooltip: Open and safely Eject all USB flash drives plugged into the computer.
gpii_app_qss_settings_usb-open.title: Open & Eject USB
gpii_app_qss_settings_usb-open.tip:
Your USB Drive

Insert a USB drive and open it with the button below.
gpii_app_qss_settings_usb-open.footerTip:
When you are done, prevent data loss by ejecting USB drives safely.

  1. Close all documents opened from the USB drive and
  2. Then use the button below to safely eject the USB drives

gpii_app_qss_settings_screenCapture.tooltip:
Screen Capture.

Take pictures of all or part of the screen.
gpii_app_qss_settings_screenCapture.title: Screen Capture
gpii_app_qss_settings_screenCapture.tip:
Screen Capture

To capture all or part of the screen

  • Click either button below
  • Then click and drag the mouse to select the part of the screen you want.
  • Let go of the mouse button. DONE.

The top button lets you “COPY” some or all of the screen so you can then “PASTE” it into any email, document, etc. (using Ctrl-V).

The 2nd button creates a “Picture” like a camera. You will find the file on your desktop.
enum: Make COPY to PASTE into doc, email, etc.
Take PICTURE and save to desktop

gpii_app_qss_settings_cloud-folder-open.tooltip: The Quick Folder has commonly requested documents, web pages, and other resources.
gpii_app_qss_settings_cloud-folder-open.title: Open Quick Folder

gpii_app_qss_settings_officeSimplificati.tooltip:
Microsoft Word simplification.

Provides simpler menus for Microsoft Word
gpii_app_qss_settings_officeSimplificati.title: MS Word Simplify
gpii_app_qss_settings_officeSimplificati.tip:
Microsoft Word simplification

Morphic can add simpler ribbons (the menu bars with icons at the top of Word) to make it easier for people who don't use all the options.

  • Choose one or both to add them to Word

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-volume.tooltip: Adjusts Windows Volume and provides Mute on/off.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-volume.title: Volume & Mute
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-volume.extendedTip: You can also change the volume using the speaker icon on the system tray (near the clock at the bottom of the screen).

gpii_app_qss_settings_translate-tools.tooltip: Tools to translate text, documents, web pages, or live speech.
gpii_app_qss_settings_translate-tools.title: Translate Tools
gpii_app_qss_settings_translate-tools.tip:
Translate Tools

To translate text, documents, web pages or live speech, try one of the following free services or apps.

Links are for convenience. No endorsement or privacy guarantee.

Microsoft Word 365 has a Translator in its Review ribbon

Web based & Apps
  • Google - Web, Text, Docs
  • Microsoft Bing - Web, Text
  • PROMT - Web
  • Reverso - Web
  • Translate Live - Live Speech
  • Microsoft Translator APP - Web, Text, Live Speech, StreetSigns

NOTE: There are also plug-ins and built-in translation features for different browsers.
